content.detailedDescription:
I was outside our house in golden valley arizona, looking west towards the mountains and up at the stars. at approx 8pm i noticed a bright light circular in shape in the western sky at about the 10 o'clock position. it was traveling at a fast rate of speed going from left to right. at first i thought it was a plane, (though i never saw a plane go that fast), when it suddenly went straight down to about the 6 o'clock position. then just as suddenly it flew straight back up to approx the previous position and flew from right to left, then disappeared. i searched the sky to see if i could see it again when i noticed a similar object due south at 11 o'clock going back and forth at a great rate of speed, again occasionally dropping down before changing directions. it then flew straight up into the clouds and i lost sight of it.  i saw no other lights on or around this object, and from where i was standing the object was approx the size of a pencil eraser. 
i had not been drinking any alcohol or smoking anything. i am not on any anti psychotic medications. i first thought it was a plane, then when it dropped i thought shooting star. i never took my eyes of the object so when it changed positions and directions so rapidly i knew in my heart it was not something i had ever seen and that is was a ufo. i was so excited i called my husband in calif to let him know. 
our house in arizona is approx 90 min southeast from vegas, near the colorado river.
content.summary: Was traveling fast then switched directions in the western sky

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:30 am, est, i was standing in a large grassy area with my grandsons who were flying their kites. my attention was drawn to an extremely brilliant, silvery dot almost directly overhead, moving very slowly east to west. the sky was bright, with a very slight haze of thin cloud. there was no sound, no contrail, no wings, fuselage or empennage. i observed it for approximately six seconds. when i called my wife's attention to it, the object vanished instantly.

i am an air force veteran with knowledge of aircraft appearance and performance. i was in military intelligence with access to mission profiles. i have flown aircraft, including as co-pilot on a chartered passenger plane. in college i majored in astronomy and cosmology with a 4.0 average, with extensive knowledge of natural astronomical bodies and events. this object i observed displayed none of the attributes i am familiar with. it was, and is, a ufo.
content.summary: Brilliant silver dot, moving east to west, very high in bright sky, no contrail, no sound, no wings, fuselage or empennage. vansihed instantly

content.detailedDescription:
My father, fiance, and i were camping at a lake. we were the only 3 left camping that night as everyone else had gone home. we were standing by the camp fire when we decided to go out onto the dock to look at the stars. since there is not a lot of light out in the country we could see tons of stars. we saw shooting stars, we saw satellites, we saw planes, everything that you would expect to see when looking up at the stars at night. however i noticed a star-like light moving across the sky at a slow rate of speed, it then stopped, stayed still for about 10-15 seconds and then it shot back across the sky in the same direction it came at a high rate of speed and then disappeared. about 20x faster than it was moving before. 

after seeing this i thought to myself "ok, thats weird maybe its just a new satellite or something " and then my fiance saw the same thing in a different part of the sky. all three of us saw about 5-6 of those star-like lights in different part of the sky. we were very excited but yet skeptical at first. but after we saw the same thing 5-6 times in different areas of the sky, we thought "what else could it be?" and each time it would move slowly across the sky, come to a stop for about 5-10 seconds and then jet off at a high rate of speed that direction it came from and then disappeared. 

in all my years of stargazing and camping i have never seen anything like that and neither had my father or my fiance.
content.summary: Multiple star like lights hover in the sky and then took off at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i witnessed a fast moving very bright white light that came from the east and immediately turned red when it slowed down more toward the north. i had initially thought it was a low-flying plane until i noticed that the lights did not blink and it seemed to be moving faster than a plane until it came to an abrupt halt and all the white lights immediately turned red.  it moved to the southwest, (where it appeared to hover for a awhile over i-70) before heading back toward the northeast again. this happened sometime between 9:45pm and 10:30pm.  we pulled off the street into a vacant lot to watch it go overhead.  i stayed in the car, but my husband stood outside our vehicle and watched as it slowly passed over us.  he described the underside view as a triangle with distinct bright red lights at the corners.  there were no green or blue blinking lights just very bright glowing red lights that did not blink.  my husband said he could hear a slight humming sound as it passed, but i didn't hear anything from inside the car. it's hard for me to say how low it actually was...My best guess would be about 1000 ft.   the object never returned to the bright white color i had initially seen, it just remained red until it went out of view.  also, when this happened, we were on our way to the gas station, but, our usual station was having system difficulities.  so, we went out of our way to try another and their systems were down during this time as well.   we do live near the air national guard and a small airport, but this did not look or sound like a plane to us.  i'm a skeptical person for the most part and not one to "report ufos" but, i would like to know if there may be a logical explaination for what we saw or if anyone else witnessed it.  i must say, this experience has made me curious.
content.summary: Triangular with bright white lights that turned bright red that did not blink

content.detailedDescription: Contacted by a neighbor by phone about 9:30 to 10pm on 4-12-10, i was in my home checking my e-mail, i was told i need to go outside with my camera as there were strange lights in south west sky low on the horizon. i took my still camera out with me to photograph but battery soon died so i ran back inside to get my camcorder. sure enough a set of lights very bright, maybe at 5 to 10 thousand feet a few miles away from my position heading directly towards my position. my first thought was it was just an aircraft with landing lights on, but soon noticed forward movement was extremely slow and lights appeared to alternate in color, but were mostly brilliant green/blue hue. still felt it was conventional aircraft at that time but continued to watch. but then object stopped and just seem to hover for a few minutes, this is when i felt this situation was unusual not normal flight characteristics, especially considering the light pattern never changed even when the object moved at a 90������angle, again very slowly but light pattern configuration never changed this continued for about 10 minutes, then object again changed direction and headed back south west until i could no longer view it, yet light pattern configuration again never changed. when lights disappeared from my view,  before i went back inside my home noticed a couple faint flashes from the direction of my wooded area, same direction i witnessed the object, i have no game camera's mounted, started feeling a bit uneasy so i went back inside for the night. my living area is remote and rural so ambient light sources are very few.  my camera and camcorder were unable to pick up the detail of the lights in the sky near as well as the naked eye could.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Configuration of bright lights in a flattened chevron shape, slow movement and hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Whilst driving home on saturday evening (4/10/2010) with my wife after grocery shopping, we saw a very strange flying object in the night sky at 8:35pm. at first it appeared to be the bright light of a plane or helecopter but then as it neared there was a 'funnel' shaped array of flashing lights emminating from the center of the large bright light in an upwards direction. as it passed overhead at a relatively slow speed it appeared that the funnel shaped lights were engulfing the large bright light and were much bigger in diameter.

i turned into a side street to watch the object disappear to the south west. i heard no sound at all coming from the object.

anybody got any ideas as to what we saw?

by the way we had not been shopping for booze!!
content.summary: This is a follow up drawing to my sighting

content.detailedDescription:
i was looking out over the city of syracuse from the north (app. 1mile north of the city line in mattydale. i just happened to look out my computer room window and i saw it flashing in the sky. the colors were that of the rainbow and they were swirling around the horizontal face of the object. no sound( that i could hear )and no movement ( in any direction )that i could make out. i looked for about 5 minutes and for the life of me i cannot explain why i didn't grab my phone and take a picture. i admit i was a little scared and by the time i collected my thoughts and came to terms with what i was looking at i opened my window so i would have an unblocked (by the window) line of sight on the object. i went outside and stared for maybe 5 to 10 minutes and then i just came inside and went to bed. i have been very puzzled with my behavior during the siting because i had always told myself i would take a picture if i ever saw anything like that. but i was honestly in shock in a way and didn't think once about taking a picture until the next morning. 

       i didn't tell anyone for awhile and as the months went by a started to think more and more about it and to question myself. i have never seen anything that i could not account for with conventional wisdom but this challenged my worldview a little bit ( actually alotta bit ). i just thought that since i had no physical proof that noone else would care what i said i saw but i really hope that your organization can assist me in making sense of it. 

...I do appreciate your efforts and thank you for your time

                    sin, 
                         eric flynn
content.summary: Mix between a sphere and a disc ( no sharp edges-more rounded).

content.detailedDescription:
Keith
april 10, 2010 | 08:12 pm

whilst driving home on saturday evening (4/10/2010) with my wife after grocery shopping, we saw a very strange flying object in the night sky at 8:35pm. at first it appeared to be the bright light of a plane or helecopter but then as it neared there was a 'funnel' shaped array of flashing lights emminating from the center of the large bright light in an upwards direction. as it passed overhead at a relatively slow speed it appeared that the funnel shaped lights were engulfing the large bright light and were much bigger in diameter.

i turned into a side street to watch the object disappear to the south west. i heard no sound at all coming from the object.

anybody got any ideas as to what we saw?

by the way we had not been shopping for booze!!
content.summary: Ufo over new lenox ?????

content.detailedDescription:
I was observing the moon and taking pictures through a reflector telescope.  the image is inverted because the telescope does not have an image erecting lense.  i took a couple of images that were clear then the green spheres appeared for a few minutes then faded in less than a second and took some more pictures. see the attached image.  i don't think they were craft because they didn't move and not moisture on the lense because when the telescope vibrated the spheres did not move relative to the moon.  any idea what they might be?  i can send images taken shortly before and after for comparison if you are interested.
regards, mark s.
content.summary: Spheres appeared during lunar observation.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend at time talked me into driving him to twin falls texas to see a uncle that had been sick and was dieing? on a 350 cc. honda
so he said.
first night on road we stopped by a fence to camp by road in sleeping bags.
left bakersfield ca.(kern) going east to hwy 40 stopped around 12pm to camp by fence marked gov. prop.No trespassing could see a rocket tower off road. mile or more away.
parked bike rolled out bags. and got warmer as it was cold.
i had just got out of navy four months before .
jorden warden was guy saw 3 things we saw? 
a guy next day came out of base on a chopper hd (moterbike) and had been on radar see it was going 10.000+ was told by his comm. to write it up as a broke down.
i got up to water fence at 3am. saw 3 lights east of my point.
thought it was street light off in destert on road as it was in line with fence ?
thought it might be over pass on road.?
but looked again later and saw lights moving toward me spaced just so that
it looked like spaced street lights but was a large light, a med, size like and a smaller sized egg shaped like steet light ?
as me being ex navy and know fences  get check by guards i got my flash light out as i had jeans on under camo to stay warm but look like a combat
fighter and did not want to be shot by guards  in copper huey!
so i lit flash light and pointed it at lights thinking it was floodlamp
on hueys but no sound was heard .
big one was two hundred ft or more egg shaped  and came down  by me i woke up guy with me to see it and he said i was a ufo and went back to sleep.
tmbleweeds moved like a huey was landing but no sound ?
light looked like it had no outline just translosent white shape
two lights went over rocket tower and did the three move like movie thing. close enconters.
i was so shaken i set an looked at it and til day light as lights slowed
and two left to west fast and made a strek of light so fast.
 big one just went over base and as light of dawn came up. it got higher and higher and as it got to colder air of next layer of sky it turned
 into a cloud and moved off to west at 30.000 ft .
next day was starting bike and guy from base came out going home. ask me if i need help as bike was not starting easy had to kick it many times .
he was radar watch that night asked if i saw any thing like 3 round shape moving high speed as it was to fast for earth things . he reported and was told to just write  up report breakdown on radar at that time and speed he reported. i told him i saw it too. but friend was back to sleep as he thought he was dreaming.
i am  reporting this now as i saw on mufon tv show a guy three guys saw very near same thing.  i do have time lapes as two weeks out and back to bakersfield.
and next time i drove a van past same spot comingfrom reno nv to bakersfind ca, 
saw a green metor going west copper color burning trail.
might have been seen by more people. end call me.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Camped by a fence on way to texas on motorbike. rocket tower was off road on hwy we on. gov fence no trespassing on sign on fence.

content.detailedDescription:
There was alot of ufo reports and indentations in ground in kingston.  went with my mothers friends son who was 18 or so.  he just got his license so wanted to go specificaly ufo hunting.  i lived in exeter at the time so we had traveled to kingston.  we pulled over the side of the road where there was this wooded hill.  as soon as we parked and got out of the car this flying object came over the horizen.  then it immediately reversed direction.  this is how we knew it wasn't a plane.  then it slowly dropped appearing as if it landed in the woods.  i being 9 years old started running in the field until i came the the woodline.  at that point i got scared as we had no flashlight to guide us through.  then we ran back to the car and left quickly amazed at what we just saw.  the object was round and my memory is faded as to what the lights were like.
the biggest impression i had was that this thing landed.  didn't actualy see it land but saw it gradualy lower itself until it went out of site into the woods.  it was close enough though to where i felt it reachable if we vetured into the woods.  the fact that it reversed direction without turning around was eye catching as well.  i often wonder if we could have had an alien encounter.  i don't remember if we did.  i just know what i saw this night.  there was a witness with me whom i haven't spoken with in years.  he was 18 and i don't ever remember discussing this incident with him either.
content.summary: Object came over the sky then reversed in same direction then landed in woods

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car with my mom and my sister on the highway near my home town. i was listening to my red ipod and i looked toward the trees on my left side and saw a helicopter go by. i looked at it and then went back to the trees and saw what looked like and black oval shaped ship with a black rudder shape object in the back and it was just hovering there.I was so confused at fist and then i realised i amm seeing a ufo. i blinked to make sure i wasnt seeing anything and when i opened my eyes it was still there. i looked away and as soon as i looked away i saw a black speck (which i am guessing was the ufo) zoom away out of the corner of my eye. the next about 5 min. i saw it again in the same spot and this time my sister saw it but she is older and said it was just a plane. which i know it is not. and after it stayed there for a couple more min. i just stopped looking at it and went back to my ipod.
content.summary: An oval with a parallel rudder in the back.

content.detailedDescription: I went to pennsylvania for a weekend vacation. when we were driving back, we took the ben franklin bridge back into nj. as we were on it, i noticed off to my right there was a stationary object above the water about a mile from my location. the object was also sort of hazy. as a bridge support went by my vision, the object was gone from the area that i originally viewed it. i then saw it approx. 2 miles to the east a second or two later. it once again was stationary. it was in the same position in the air and strangely did not increase or decrease in size even though my distance from it changed. while moving down the highway, it was obscured by trees for a couple seconds, then it was gone when i was able to see it's location again. i looked all around the area however could not get any other location on it. i remember thinking to tell the other four people in the car with me but for some reason, i didn't tell anyone about it until later that night. the entire event may have lasted about 10 seconds from start to finish. the object could have been easily seen by anyone in the area due to its location was in a wide open area of the sky over the water. this object should have been recorded on the radar of the philadelphia airport. it was well within reach and the area of that airport. judging by my memory of its location, it was probably closer to the walt whitman bridge than the ben franklin bridge. even if i was mistaken on this object and it was a plane, the shape was close to a proper "l" shape and to relocate to its second location, the "plane" would have had to be flying backwards. not possible. this event took place on 04/11/2010 at approx. 3:30 to 4:00 pm est.
content.summary: Witnessed boomerang shaped object when crossing over ben franklin bridge

content.detailedDescription: My family has just returned from grocery shopping on a friday night, in the fall of 1967, october i think, but it also may have been sept.  it was a clear night, no clouds in the sky.  we lived on the edge of a recently developed neighborhood on the outskirts of keene, nh, so behind our house was forest and very little in the way of ambient light.  my parents called me to the back yard from my bedroom and i went out to join them and watch a strange light in the sky.  the light was like a very bright star, and it was at about 60-75 degrees above the western horizon.  it changed color from red to green to blue to yellow to white as it moved in a fairly tight formation up, down, to the right, to the left, down, up, and in zig zag patterns.  there was no noise, and we watched in awe as it continued its color changes and slow random movements across the sky.  within a few minutes, another star like object appeared near it, also changing color and moving around randomly.  the objects were fairly close together when an arc of light moved between them, back and forth.  one of the objects then disappeared as the remaining object continued its random movement, until it moved lower in the sky and became obscured by the tree line of the forest in our back yard.  i was only 8 years old at the time, but i remember this incident clearly.  my parents and i were clearly freaked by this incident.  my dad called the police and reported the sighting, and i believe there was an article in the paper, the keene sentinel, about the sighting from several observers in the town.
content.summary: One, then two start like objects that changed color and moved about the sky in random patterns

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were sitting out on the front porch watching stars. i pointed out the "gold" one and she said it was a plane because it was moving. at first i didn't see it move but as i stared at it- it started to move from side to side. it would be really still then it would glide again. as i looked around there were about 10 of them things in the sky all doing the same thing. i called my neighbor across the street. they came out and were all stunned.(as was i)i guess i know why all the dogs bark at night now.It's been over an hour ago and they are still up in the sky. two of them look like they were playing tag. i'm completely creeped and probably will not sleep tonight!
content.summary: I thought it was an unusual color star, then it started moving in circles and side to side!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a friends house about 11:48 pm when i noticed this huge bright ball of light in the sky. at first, i thought it might be a porch light on top of a hill. so i kept my eye on it but soon noticed that it was moving. i watched it for about a minute but then it disappeared. i was about to call my husband around 11:52 pm but then i heard this humming noise. almost like a woman humming softly. so i rolled down my windows some more and it got louder. all of a sudden i had this overwhelming need to look up out of the sun roof and as i did i saw this huge ball of light again blocking my view of the sky. it had no detail but it was like looking at the sun except for the fact that instead being orange it was white. and i could tell the humming was coming from it. but the thing that bothered me the most was that the light coming off this ufo didn't shine onto my vehicle. it didn't cause any other the surrounding area to light up or be seen. it went across the sky, blocking my view for about 3 seconds, then disappeared. i looked back at the road and realized i had come to a complete stop in the middle of the road. i quickly started driving again and looking around to see if it would reappear. i called my husband and told him about the finding right away. ever since i saw it.. i've been seeing glimpses of shadows. i thought maybe it was my glasses but when i took them off i was still seeing things walk in front of me. i'm also terribly too hot. and nothing seems to cool me off. plus, i'm easily agitated now. a lot more then i've ever been.
content.summary: Driving home from a friends house and say this huge bright like in sky. soon the bright light was over my car but not shining on my car.

content.detailedDescription: At 0630 cst, i had just backed into a parking space at my work. i had about 10 minutes until time to clock in , so i was sitting in my vehicle smoking one last cigarette. i was looking south/ south easternly when a slight movement caught my eye towards the east. as i looked over i saw an object, like a unsharpened pencil, moving through the sky. the moon was just a sliver cresent, and the sun was not up yet. the object just moved along, at no great speed,  and no up or down movement was detected. the object moved slightly under the cresent moon, in a northernly direction, and was a few inches in lenght at arms length. it continued moving in a straight line for approx the 3 minutes that i could see it , until the roof line of the warehouse blocked my view. the object was dark in volro,  brownish black. i just sat there watching it, not sure of what is was. it made no sound that i could here.
content.summary: Long flat rectangle shape,  like an unsharpened pencil

content.detailedDescription:
I was doing some star gazing with my 20x80 astronomical binoculars trying to get a good view of mars to the direct west. i then noticed a brightly light pulsating light that appeared to have a rotation of colors (red/blue/yellow) off on the distance towards the shores of lake erie, in erie pa.

i tried using my bino's but hand shake was too much, so i then went to my kodak z612 digital camera that has a 2x tele-converter matched to the already strong 12x digital zoom or 420mm (2x) doubled together (840x).

i live on the higher portion of erie on what is called chestnut hill on or above of west grandview blvd with a panoramic view of the city and shoreline.

i first took video of the object for a few seconds but zoom in video mode in very limited. i then switch to photo mode with the settings still set for mars with with a longer shutter speed and aperture settings.

it was only visible for about 10 minutes and stayed stationary the whole time in relation to the stars and planets (mars) in the same sky shot. i was very excited and kept trying new ways and camera settings but the last time or about 10 minutes in length i returned to the window the last time and it was gone!

the attached photo is the only one i got off minus the brief video that i mistakingly deleted, which only showed a long off blinking light anyway.
i have submitted 3 versions, first one is the un-edited version, the second is the cropped version and the last is the color inverted image that shows it is a solid object versus the black sky.

i am looking for someone to match up the light pattern, colors and placement to some sort of terrestrial aircraft or to confirm my sighting as a ufo event.

thank you.
content.summary: Looking out window to the west-to-north west toward lake erie

content.detailedDescription: Following my report yesterday there was two appeared to be identical as that appeared after the craft sighting go through the same area as the mystery crafts hovered a bit yesterday they came from a slightly more south direction and were much slower today as they approached they changed course a bit and went over the area where the crafts hovered yesterday and then took the exact course as the 3 following choppers did yesterday along with the preceding mystery crafts.
content.summary: Black choppers like that appeared after the craft yesterday.

content.detailedDescription:
I experienced in naguabo puerto rico a ufo sighting.  i looked up at the mountains and began taking pictures of the view when i noticed a black spot through the camera.  when i removed the camera from my eye and tried to look for my self i could not see anything.  but when i focused again with my camera i saw a black dot in the sky towards the mountains. i was so nervous when i saw this obscure object, i just felt chills all over my body.  

i then returned home and my wife zoomed into the photo with the camera and we noticed it was some sort of ufo.  my wife then downloaded the pictures onto her laptop where we were able to take a closer look and believed it was a ufo.  

after i experienced this i began taking more pictures, on november 7th 2009 and noticed another ufo with my camera.  i have several pictures with these sightings.  the last time i saw a ufo was by my home in january 2010.
content.summary: On october 30, 2009 and other dates as well i experienced ufo sightings in the mountains of puerto rico.  i began taking pictures with my camera and zooming the picture in only confirmed my suspicions of this sightings as you will see attached,

content.detailedDescription:
My family walked into the parking lot of our apartment complex to release two helium filled balloons.  being valentine's day leftover gifts, these floating balloons were bright metallic red. once released, the two balloons floated up and up as we watched them rise. however, what caught our eye was further up and over to the right. we saw a shining chrome sphere that stayed in the same place in the sky, motionless up about 10000 feet. the fact that it did not move a bit really got our attention.  what can do that? five of us were watching and all of us five asked, "what is that thing?"  it looked like a well defined white chrome sphere.

it was in exactly the same place for at least 10 minutes.  the bright ball shaped object was either reflecting light from the sun or it was sending out light in a blinking white sequence.  it remained in exactly the same place int the sky... just hanging there perfectly still in the same location as it reflected bright light.
content.summary: Sphere -chrome ball reflecting light or emitting light in the morning 04/09/2010.

content.detailedDescription: 3 of my students and i saw what looked like a black bird way up in the sky but it was much too big and did not move like a bird. it seemed to hover in one place and then move. it kept doing these odd movements for about 10 minutes or so and there appeared 3 jets up in the same area. my students saw the black object decend straight down to the ground very quickly from very high above. that is what we saw. we are in the south area of santa fe nm
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black object high in the sky..Thought it was a bird but too high and not acting like bird. it stopped and moved and eventually dropped straitht down. 3 jets seemed to follow.

content.detailedDescription:
Since the 5th of april i've watched blackhawks hover over our neighborhood for 15- to 20 minutes at a time, and this has gone on for days mostly in the early evening hours now nellis afb is to the north of las vegas. what makes this odd is the military follows flight patterns and only flies in certain areas also saw to f22's fly right under a commercial jet it was strange then the other night it sounded like the blackhawks where back and when i went outside to get a better look i was stunned to see it was actually a chinook. what the hell are they up to??
i mean i've lived here for 35 years and they just don't do things like this so why now??
content.summary: Military very active flying over city area's

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed in sam's club parking lot, (i-70 & m-291), an hour before sunset.
witnessed approx. 7 to 10 "lights" moving west at high rate of speed.  started with white lights followed by green lights and a couple of yellow lights with two green lights at the end.  lights were spaced equidistant except for last two, which were closer together.  i estimate they were at airliner altitude and the lights might have been several miles apart.  the lights traversed the sky at the same altitude moving in a flat line.  they didn't flash, spark, change course or size.  they looked like a string of jewels in the sky.  we witnessed them for approx. 20 seconds in a 60 degreee field of view before they disappeared behind sam's club.  we sat in the car for a couple of minutes trying to decide what we saw.  we looked around for other witnesses, but nobody else seemed to be paying attention.  we were too far away to see any craft, just lights.  i am a long time plane spotter and trained storm spotter.  definitely not planes or weather balloons-they were moving way too fast for that.  definitely not a shooting star or comet.  lights were moving in a flat plane straight west. there were other jets in other parts of the sky that night and several were leaving contrails, but these left no tracks.  i would estimate they were actually over lees summit or grandview mo.  we were completely sober.
we're both from missouri- the show me state and both of us feel that you would have to "show us" in order for us to believe.  an alien spaceship would have to land in our backyard in order for us to believe in little gray men, but in writing this i also realize that my above description is a classic ufo sighting, which is why i'm posting this.
we've seen nothing in the local press of course!
content.summary: Lights in sky moving west at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
While i was waiting for my bus at the midway orange line station, 
i saw a military f-18 hornet jet coming out of from the east, heading right straight towards the middle of the runway, then it made a few upside down loops a few times, and then it flew right in made a very sharp turn and flew right out again, heading back towards east again within less then a minute time.

i do not know why why he or she was doing this for, but it made a quite a few very weird strainge manouvers. like a acrobat. i thought it was going to crash right into midway airport, and that had really scared to death! 

why would a military aircraft be doing aireobatic manouvers right in the middle of a public comercial airport?

does anyone knows the reason for this???...

thank you
content.summary: Military aircraft flew in and flew right out of mdw

content.detailedDescription:
I work at mcdonld's and this the second time i have seen something in this area. it's about 5:45 im doing my normal rutonie. i look up for a sec something caught my eye. it's not a plane no green or red flashing lights. this thing was a soild white. it came from the east and did a sharp right turn going northeast towards detroit. i was freakin out a little. it was moving slow no sound. i was watching it for a good 4-5 min.
it was going past i-75 ne and that was the last i saw of it.
content.summary: A bright light in the sky move a slow pace

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting a friend���s dogs out into their backyard near winterville, just west of firetower road.  there was high visibility ��� light cirrus clouds near the horizon, low-lying but nothing but blue sky above 10,000 feet.  i looked up and saw what i thought was a star.  this took place around lunch-time, between 11:30 and 12:30 roundabouts.  the star was very bright and i thought it was strange because i couldn���t see any other stars.  then it started to move, very, very slowly west to northeast over the course of the next 7 minutes.  

i tried not to take my eyes off of it because it was small and clearly above 30,000 feet as i could see some 747s making contrails (short trails due to such clear conditions) below and around the ���star���.  it was not using any of the sky-lanes that planes normally use.  

occasionally, maybe three minutes in, and then at the five or six-minute mark, it would stop totally for 30 seconds.  sometimes it seemed to have a pulsing, circular aura around it that was only faintly discernible from the sky around it.   i was wearing a good pair of sunglasses with polarization so the sky was very blue and the star quite bright against it.  when i took the glasses off the star was still visible but difficult to track.  

the bizarre thing is that my eyes went right to it, and there was 360 degrees of clear blue sky.  if i hadn���t immediately seen it or known it was there, i could have missed it.  would have missed it.  

it was very bright.  again, i thought it was a star.  that high up, that shape, that type of light.  the weather was perfect ��� spring time and about 72 degrees.  i wanted to shout to the neighbors to ask ���what is that���, but for those 7 minutes the neighborhood was a ghost town.  

i didn���t take a picture because my phone was inside the house and i knew if i took my eyes off of it i might lose it.  sure enough, just as it passed directly overhead i glanced away for a second, maybe two, and then it was gone.  weirdest thing i���ve ever seen.  i work outside and i know the air traffic here.  this was highly unusual.
content.summary: Daytime start tracked for 7 minutes across pitt county

content.detailedDescription: After running a few miles around the walking track i was headed back to the car and saw image in the sky.
content.summary: Saw a v-shaped object after jog in the park late at night.

content.detailedDescription: On saturday, april 10, at around 5:20 pm est, i woke up from a nap and looked out of my bedroom window. it was still bright sunshine and very high occasional wispy clouds. other than that, the sky was blue. i looked up and saw a bright orb - it looked at first glance to be a very high flying aircraft. i'm an aircraft buff so looking up to see what's flying over is something i've always done. it took a matter of seconds to realize that it wasn't an aircraft. the next thing i thought was that it was a star. just as i convinced myself that that was was it was, it dawned on me that it's a little too bright outside to be a star. it was then that i noticed that this thing was moving, very slowly north. at this point i knew is was something special. i grew more and more excited as i watched. i watched it a little while longer before i ran to get my camera. brought the camera to the the window an realized that i wouldn't be able to catch it with the type of camera i had. at this point the object was crossing slowly over my house. i ran into the other room. put some pants and shoes on and ran outside. at this point, the object was over my house. as it crossed over i thought that maybe i'm seeing a satellite."naw" i thought. "it's moving too slowly. at this point i noticed that it was also alternating colors. orange then white then orange then white at a constant pace. i thought "well maybe it's a mylar balloon. it was very high because it would dip behind the occasional wispy cirrus cloud. "as i began to settle on balloon based on the speed at which it traveled, the object dimmed then disappeared as it crossed cascade road and over the golf coarse. i stood a watched for about another 2 minutes. then it reappeared, seemingly hovering over the golf coarse. the object hung in the sky for bout another 3 minutes, then made a course change, now headed west. as i watched it move now parallel to cascade road i, then, noticed a second object slowly grow brighter. both objects hanging in the same area of sky, the first object brighter than the second. then, after about 1 minute, both disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like a star, changed color, moved slowly across the sky in one direction (north), disappeared, reappeared stationary, then moved slowly in another direction (west) as another object appeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving out around the mountain in mars hill maine on the pierce road with a friend around 12:50 a.M almost 1:00 a.M and my girl friend was driving my vehicle and we were driving about 50 mph and out of no wheres 4 whiteish/alien looking things that were roughly 7ft tall ran right out in front of us and we jammed on the breaks and the 4 of them ran off but right after we stoped they had a little kid type alien that was on the other side of the road and it was all bloody. right after when seeen them we didn't know what to think my girl friend started crying and i was extremely shocked and i asked her what she just seen and she seen the same things as me
content.summary: 4 tanish white men/animal/alien with 1 kid that was bloddy
